.. _installation:

Installation
===========

FAST-PT can be installed using pip:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install fast-pt

Or with conda:

.. code-block:: bash

   conda install fast-pt

For development installation:

.. code-block:: bash

   git clone https://github.com/jablazek/FAST-PT.git
   cd FAST-PT
   pip install -e .
